name: Return To Civilization
description:
Download the game for a better experience! It is not optimized for playing on a web browser.

Return to Civilization is a quest of a lost merchant to find his shipwrecks after crashing into a forest.

Find your way back to civilization before dying of starvation, becoming insane, or running out of time. To survive, our merchant needs to collect and eat  mushrooms. But keep in mind that some mushrooms can have adverse effects
